pullRequest.title: Match "OtherAttribute" attributes in any order

commit.message:
Match "OtherAttribute" attributes in any order

We already have code to match keyword and named attributes in any order
in an attribute list, and to match with "less is ok" functionality.

This commit extends that to work with "OtherAttribute" AST nodes as
well. Note that it is not fully implemented here, as I took a shortcut
that would leave this pattern:

```python
@x("a")
@x("a")
def foo:
  ...
```

still matching this code:

```python
@x("a")
def foo:
  pass
```

I'm leaving this as a TODO for now.

Fixes #1406.

nodes.bodyText: Note that "the general case" is actually just the specific "OtherAttribute" case
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1298,13 +1298,25 @@ and m_list__m_attribute (xsa: A.attribute list) (xsb: A.attribute list) =
       with Not_found -> fail ()
       )
   (*e: [[Generic_vs_generic.m_list__m_attribute]] [[NamedAttr]] pattern case *)
-  (* the general case *)

nodes.bodyText:
better to remove the body of m_list__m_attribute and call
m_list_in_any_order ... in it that way all the places where we look for attributes will have this new behavior.
(need to check the possible perf regression when applied to all the instances).

-    (m_list__m_attribute) a2 b2 >>= (fun () ->
+    (m_list_in_any_order ~less_is_ok:true m_attribute a2 b2) >>= (fun () ->
